string.value:
To be acknowledged as the ultimate explorer in Maple World, let's earn the #b<Maple Explorer>#k title.r
Victoria Explorer
Ossyria Explorer
You must earn a total of 2 titles.

#b#eTitle - Maple Explorer#n#k
● Requirement(s)
Can acquire after earning the Victoria Explorer and Ossyria Explorer titles.#b
● Status
#y29015# : #u29015#
#y29012# : #u29012#
You have finally acquired the #b<Maple Explorer>#k title upon earning both the Victoria and Ossyria Explorer titles.
Congratulations on become a #b<Maple Explorer>#k. You will be recognized as a true explorer from this moment on.

You've finished exploring two major regions in Maple World, Victoria Island and Ossyria. I shall now grant you the #b<Maple Explorer>#k title. This may be a notable accomplishment, but do not stop trying. Keep exploring and face challenges to acquire other titles that will become a part of your Explorer identity.
Please come back and see me after you've acquired two titles, the #bVictoria Explorer#k and the #bOssyria Explorer#k titles.
